ygData.subject: A big entrance
ygData.msgSnippet: Flying toward the volcano above the Greek Predacon base A huge object appears on the scanners. Megaton had arrived. Ha ha ha ha ha He thought as he flew

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Flying toward the volcano above the Greek Predacon base A huge object
appears on the scanners. Megaton had arrived. "Ha ha ha ha ha" He thought as
he flew toward the slightly lesser faction. He knew that with the right
leadership they could be a formitable force. The mutant was growing tired of
the humoring Megatron had given him. He had been granted a rank and title
but cut out of anything important. Soon he would reclaim the rights that his
DNA Donor had given him.
